title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 392.2 - Interest rate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 392.2 - Interest rate

State Regulations

In computing the interest due on an award, the actuary
shall use simple interest at the rate provided in section
5004
of the Civil Practice Law and Rules, except as provided in section
27
of
the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
392.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
